src:
Mensos Bersilaturahmi Datangi Gedung KPK
04 Nov 2019, 09:07 by Chairul Umam


Mensos Bersilaturahmi Datangi Gedung KPK

KBRN, Jakarta : Menteri Sosial Juliari Batubara hari ini mendatangi Gedung Merah Putih Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) yang berada di Kuningan Jakarta selatan, Senin (4/11/2019).
Juliari Batubara tiba di Gedung KPK sekitar pukul 08.58 WIB dengan kendaraan dinas barunya dan ditemani beberapa pejabat dari Kemensos. 
Saat ditanya awak media, Juliari mengaku ingin bersilaturahmi dengan Pimpinan KPK guna memperkuat komitmen Kemensos dalam pemberantasan korupsi di lingkungan Kementerian Sosial Republik Indonesia.
"Kami bersilaturahmi, saya sebagai Menteri Sosial yang baru ingin memantapkan komitmen kami untuk bersinergi dalam rangka pemberantasan korupsi, khususnya di lingkungan Kementerian Sosial," ungkap Juliari Batubara.
text:
Minister of Social Affairs Visit the KPK Building
Nov 04 2019, 09:07 by Chairul Umam


Minister of Social Affairs Visit the KPK Building

KBRN, Jakarta: Minister of Social Affairs Juliari Batubara today visited the Red and White House Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) located in Kuningan, South Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
Juliari Batubara arrived at the KPK Building at around 08.58 West Indonesian Time in his new official vehicle and was accompanied by several officials from the Ministry of Social Affairs.
When asked by the media crew, Juliari claimed to want to stay in touch with the KPK leadership to strengthen the Ministry of Social Affairs' commitment to eradicating corruption within the Ministry of Social Affairs of the Republic of Indonesia.
"We stay in touch, as the new Minister of Social Affairs, we want to strengthen our commitment to work together in the context of eradicating corruption, especially within the Ministry of Social Affairs," said Juliari Batubara.
